extendedInfo.description: Do you know the capitals of the United States (USA), Germany, France, Spain and China??? Here is the chance to test your capital knowledge  in this quiz / trivia and see if you're as good as you think or actually learn something... A real quiz battle.* Mail from users *Much better than world flags quiz and other geopgraphy quizzes for learning countries and their capitalsMuch more intense with the 2 player mode compared to who becomes rich / millionaire, triviaburst and quisr*Like us on Facebook to get exclusive news!!http://www.facebook.com/fliskoappsPlease note that questions are in English.The quiz / trivia game features a single player and a thrilling two player heads-up mode. - Sharpen your skills in the single player mode and reach the top of the high score list. - In the heads-up mode you can challenge your friends on the same phone and see who is best at geography. Similar to worlds flag quiz trivia.- Question on capitals from all continents (Washington DC, Paris, London, Rome, Madrid, Beijing, Bangkok, Brasilia, Buenos Aires, Cairo, Tokyo, Berlin, Copenhagen, Stockholm, Amsterdam, Berlin)

reviews.comment: FORCE CLOSE! What a shame I cant even play

reviews.title: Airpush :-(
reviews.comment: Was fine until I started receiving ads though airpush... Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SPAM ALERT
reviews.comment: Great app, if you enjoy receiving AirPush spam.  Sorry, but this app isn\'t good enough for me to put up with spam notifications.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh ?
reviews.comment: Jerusalem is the capital of Palestine ?! Gimme a break ...The state of Palestine isn\'t recognised by the United Nations yet. What a load of crap.Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: UNINSTALL ASAP
reviews.comment: I will NEVER download this app again until.the developers of this app will realize that Jerusalem was NEVER in its  history the Capital of a non existing \"nation\" of \"palestine\" nor will Jerusalem ever become such a capital. After all, how can one city be the capital of more than one nation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It is giving us information. Fantastic app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: Would be a 5 stars if result page was giving us the option to check the wrong answer(s).
